display_long_description:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

[media]


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

[media]


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

[media]



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

[media]



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

[media]











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
display_long_description_unprocessed:
**Track Craft is a mixed-reality racing game where you can turn your surroundings into a racetrack.**


# ULTIMATE MR PLAYGROUND 

Use your surroundings and turn them into a mixed-reality race track.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75308617_1272215060801635_5042919391744431689_n.mp4?_nc_cat=103&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=PgVOlz55WiMQ7kNvwFzSRfN&_nc_oc=Admcyw1BkuaLYF_wvVwd0Ya-vvsUm-94tP829spR3k90mGd42WiepTGFgA3_lRg7pA0&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=_3af4PbcRZeXijGfkRnWTw&oh=00_AfM1m-c78F3hWiEPq-AoztSna9-urbFI3C8mfe49PDtjHQ&oe=6857D25D)


# EXPLORE DIFFERENT WORLDS

Get behind the wheel and experience the 104 pre-built tracks spread across 5 different worlds. Each brings new mechanics, challenges, cars, and skins to unlock.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39001674_2499265186932117_1940974824575956372_n.mp4?_nc_cat=100&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=9fSGvM4WQhAQ7kNvwHlW7Wq&_nc_oc=AdnoSeRBxkwM5z43So_lcOsT0Oaj2e--TpLRp3Y-SlYso6efapB75SHxIAXy9bK2Hj4&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=_3af4PbcRZeXijGfkRnWTw&oh=00_AfNAGLRioYT6p2oKsSme_wv6QmOn6fsig-SeGBYyaIgSKw&oe=6857EC52)


# CRAFT YOUR OWN TRACKS

Create tracks intuitively thanks to full hand tracking and share them online. Or just race on new tracks created by the community every day.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/75375767_1695057634657861_9198351083050459907_n.mp4?_nc_cat=108&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=fDyd4AOS4fMQ7kNvwEdUwfU&_nc_oc=AdkL4P5_rfW_ui_vzvn9QSoI_PZYDzHaGCDfk2QrfxNGqlDu5DOANHbXVc7Me3Zk0MY&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra3-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=_3af4PbcRZeXijGfkRnWTw&oh=00_AfOjv8sDkPmLkgfFG6VeCx4b6bqz4EgPofXrEbNagDxjsQ&oe=6857F263)



# ONLINE MULTIPLAYER

Play and Craft with your friends at home or online with players across the globe.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/39031608_1046525513655988_8291945262237532410_n.mp4?_nc_cat=109&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=o4XxrX539yIQ7kNvwFQ05Q2&_nc_oc=Admvk9XWYMribQ6K8oRUTfgRDOg4VWTuNcuM2nBGoqPZtyhDLZYUFPEFDffmdD3d0zM&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-2.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=_3af4PbcRZeXijGfkRnWTw&oh=00_AfO82WAXabZT8AMFVTFGAUxuFjcHZ7q0bIondah0RKE3SA&oe=6857E8EE)



# BUILD UP YOUR COLLECTION

Unlock new exciting cars by collecting stars.

![{"height":426,"type":"video","width":1280}](https://scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com/v/t64.7195-25/38982508_850050307226020_5528409964007448806_n.mp4?_nc_cat=102&ccb=1-7&_nc_sid=b20b63&_nc_ohc=gXQ4jz8KANwQ7kNvwGZB_fs&_nc_oc=AdlbKlB1h3DvQGHhdvzdqsp2YSTg5dYaaMaqs8xGQelireZRM9ThVXfeBJuK4j6iPKQ&_nc_zt=28&_nc_ht=scontent-fra5-1.oculuscdn.com&_nc_gid=_3af4PbcRZeXijGfkRnWTw&oh=00_AfNYEdMjcTJ_h4iUtjH4MWyi3KIqoMutrbou4eZn6t6AEg&oe=6857F0D6)











# THE FUN NEVER ENDS



Available on Quest 3/3s, Quest Pro, and Quest 2.
